content.detailedDescription:
Hello this morning at around 6:30 ish i seen the exact same thing.
a bluish green light streaking above our school as i was putting out recycle. a parent and his child were pulling up to the school to drop off for babysitting services and they saw it too. he person i was standing with did not see it. it was only about 40-50 off the ground or about 10-15 ft above the roof of the school maybe even less. (not sure how tall the roof of school is. 
it was crazy, it looked like and oblong  shape fluorescent 
i have seen similar before in winthrop harbor il. a few years back 5 or so while driving home with my granddaughter we saw a small blue glowing lighted ball zooming around about 20 ft off the ground. it was odd but neither of us responded to it except to say to each other what is that then we kept driving.
it flew over the school and other witness saw it fall(crash)or disappear in the distance
also about 2009, while looking up in the sky walking out my back door my husband and i 
saw a bright star in the west sky go completely dark like someone shut the light off and went to bed. it was before summer so it was after dark maybe 8:30-9 pm.
content.summary: Oblong light folourescent

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back patio just finishing my daily meditation on my mat and when i opened eyes i looked up and there it was going into the cloud and it had reflective like glow to it and it was oval and i was waiting for it to come out of the cloud because it was going on a straight line path .But it did not come out of the cloud.
content.summary: It was oval shape and had refelective light like slightly glowing but it went into the cloud and i was waiting for it to come out of the cloud but it did not.

content.detailedDescription:
Normally would not report lights in the sky, but, this was different.
while sitting outside looking at the stars, i observed several planes flying there routine patterns in/out of san antonio airport over new braunfels.
first spotted the two red lights ascending from the san antonio report direction. they were solid on and red. first wondered where the green and white flashing lights were. then the two red lights stopped in the sky.
this got my attention. planes do not stop moving. then it made a 90 degree turn south. made several more movements in different directions, each time stopping before changing flight direction. like it was lost or looking for something. i thought the altitude was too high for a remote control toy.
oh, the red lights began flashing after the first stop after ascending.
both red lights flashed together. appeared to be only one plane? if that was what it was. finally flew north in a straight line, for a good distance. stopped and began alternating from red to white lights flashing.
it was brighter lights while doing this alternating white/red light.
then just red lights again. then the red lights pulsed instead of flashing.
did this at least twice while i watched. finally flew dew west until it went below the tree line of the home across from me.
i have watched the international space station fly overhead and other satellites. with the aid of an app. on my laptop to tell me when and where to look. i've watched many planes fly over with there flashing red, green, and white lights. this was not one of those.
still, i felt the object was man made, not alien. probably someone has a toy, (very expensive one to fly so high) or the military was flying some experimental craft. but the flight direction changes and light show seemed to human controlled. 
reminded me of watching a goodyear blimp putting on a nighttime light show.
thought it could be a helicopter, but why all the direction changes and light show. hope to hear others saw this same object and someone can tell me what it was, cause it was certainly different.
regards,
frank
ps: tried to record this with my cell phone, but it was too dark or too far away. can't see it on my phone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 10/19/2015 20:40 to 20:50 watched 2 red lights ascend, stop, make 90 degree turn. red lights began flashing. several direction changes. lights began flashing red & white. brightness increased. then pulsed red lights only. flew off to the west.

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting took  place in sudbury ontario canada on 10/07/2015 at approximately 9:10 pm. i was driving to pick up my lady friend from work just before dark.I parked in the parking lot of homesence.I exited the car to wait for her.An object in the sky caught my attention .It stood out from the back ground as it was brightly illuminated, silent & stationary.It appeared to be hovering at an angle which i found strange.I'm familiar with various planes that fly the air space above sudbury.This was no plane or star .
one other person in the  parking lot observed it.I proceeded to take a picture with my cell phone (s4 samsung android) because it was odd that after 10 minutes passed,the object never moved.We tryed to guess what it was.Not much  detail was revealed as it was at a signifigant altitude.I left the parking lot returning home perplexed as to what the object could of been.Total observation was around 10 min .The object was still in the same position when i left the area.
apon returning home i uploaded the pic to the computer to see if i could enhance it for a better look.When i enlarged it,a distinct outline or solid shape seemed to be evident as well as an illuminating consession of lights with a twinkling  x  patteren along the edge.However the picture quality is very grainy at such a magnification but interesting never the less.I tried different contrast and colours to bring out the most definiton possible.
content.summary: Observed bright stationary light from a parking lot for 10 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking a trail and noticed 5 objects hovering in the same spot. i watched as they stayed in the same formation for about 40 minutes. then one at a time at a normal speed they flew west ward and disappeared in the horizon. i snapped a few pictures and videos with my phone.
content.summary: 5 objects hovered for 40 minutes then one at a time flew away in the same direction

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday october 18,2015 at 11.10am
on visiting the pigeon point lighthouse in pescadero, ca 94060 we walked the lighthouse path and looked up to the sky and clouds.
i began to take photographs with my cell phone. after taking the picture i noticed that a ball seemed to sit in the picture to the left of the lighthouse, hovering in the sky.
it did not move just hovered,circular silver in color with lights on it.

immediately i began taking photos and can see it behind the clouds as well as in the sky without clouds.

i did not loose site of the object, it just remained there. it was still there an hour as we watched and remained when we drove away.

after i drove away we watched a helicopter flying in the direction of the object/
content.summary: Witnessed the ufo hovering to th left of th lighthouse. took photos and observed cirle ball shaped with lights

content.detailedDescription: hey buddy and i were fishing on the surf and i just happened to look up and see these lights flickered around in the sky so i reached over there and grab my iphone took a video of it for 50 seconds stopped it took another video for a few seconds and didn't see it in the second one thought for sure i have a ufo  because of the way it was bouncing all around i was leaning against the truck holding the iphone 6 as still as possible.  i focused in quite a bit on the object so i may have lost resolution.  i thought it was just an airplane at first but the lights were moving around so much had to be a ufo.  i showed the video to my fishing buddy couple days later he thinks i'm crazy
content.summary: was fishing on the beach, looked up, saw lights moving around erratically, got out iphone and videoed it.

content.detailedDescription: I had woken up and came downstairs to go get the mail. as i get my mail i decide to go outside a little bit further to enjoy the sun a little bit. perfect clear blue sky not a cloud in sight. the sun was shining. as i turn back to go inside whilst looking up i see a small orange-ish orb above my house. i immediately go inside and get my brother and mother to come outside to se it. it was still there... my brother is like whoa what is that. my mom is like it's venus.. i'm not sure but i dont think venus is a orange orb above my house. we went back inside. never gave it a second thought.(because my mom had a good explanation)
content.summary: Middle of the day around noon. i go out to get mail and stand outside enjoying the sunshine. when i look up( dont ask me why ) and above our house i see a small orange reddish orb just sitting there in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my house and i can't remember exactly what i was doing at the time. right when i left my door took a couple steps and looked up at the sky, there was some clouds but they were transparent because i could see the stars. when directly over me.. like exactly over me i seen a star like object fly over me and towards the direction i was walking. it lasted no more than 4 seconds. it left no trail behind it and i was surprised to say the least.
content.summary: I walked outside of my house in the evening, not sure where or what i was doing but i looked up and this star like object flew over me directly straight.

content.detailedDescription: I had just got into my car when i saw the lights out of my car window to the right. my boyfriend saw them also. they were in a perfectly straight line and did not move or change color. the lights remained the solid white the whole time. i took the first two pictures out of my car window sitting still and the next one when driving at a different angle. as i continued down the road towards the lights after three minutes and many twists and turns (the road was hilly and curvy) another orb appeared and the ufo was closer to the ground. it was extremely long and all of the lights were perfectly aligned. the lights shone even brighter when i saw them closer. i lost sight of the lights as i drove further down the road. the black line across the first two pictures is a power line. also planes flew above the lights and around them but you could tell the difference between them because the planes moved and had flashing colored lights.
content.summary: Perfect line of hovering lights low to ground

content.detailedDescription: I couldn't sleep and woke up at around 3 am. i had my window open and it was a starry night. i was just staring out my window not looking at anything in particular when 3 star like lights zoomed/flashed by extremely quickly. i instantly was thinking no i didnt see that. then slightly looked in the direction it went in only to see breifly one of the star like lights before it zoomed out of my view.. that part was extremely brief. i was dumbfounded.
content.summary: I couldnt sleep and was wide awake staring out my window when i seen 3 star like craft wiz by my window.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way back from the store and just happened to see something that caught my eye off in the horizon. it was a craft that was blinking with the colours red, green and blue. i stood watching it for about 2 minutes with no change of direction or movement. i remember thinking wow this is like the 4th ufo i've seen in 3 years.
content.summary: At the same field that i always cross to go to the convience store, but this time i was coming back from the store and i seen a craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to the mac's convenience store just entering a schools field to cut across to get to the store. i looked up and behind me and noticed the object moving slow with no sound. i thought is was a plane but the green and red light were too big and solid(not flashing) and i could see in the night sky the shape of the craft was triangular in nature. i could see the silhouette of the craft.  i pointed at it and almost instantly the green light turned off; it was just the small white light blinking and the big solid red light. as soon as that happened i said in a whisper voice "i see you !!" and pointed at it adamantly(the hairs on the back of my neck stood up and on my whole body) almost immediately it gave of a white transparent force field ripple effect that did not go far from the craft itself. i felt sick at that moment and looked away walking towards to store. i looked back and it was gone.
content.summary: First viewed moving with a small white blinking light and a big solid green and red light

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear evening, dark sky with stars, around 8pm.  i was out with my dog.  he was running around trying to find rabbits and i looked up to the sky to see if i could see anything.  i saw a plane flying at high altitude, it had the typical flashing strobe lights... then  i saw two satellites moving slowly across the sky.   they were moving on different paths and i watched them closely as they each disappeared out of site.  

as i was scanning the sky, a bright pin point of white light flashed nearly above me.   it flashed bright white, almost like a light from a far away flash bulb.   it was very bright and white.  i could feel my eyes adjust to the quick bright light burst.   the flash point of light was about three times the size of venus....But it was a burst of white light.   it lasted two seconds or even less.....It was over fast.  

i continued to watch the sky to see if i could see a plane or just what it was...  and about 30 seconds later, the light burst again and went out.   it was in a slightly different spot in the sky, but close to where i say the first flash of light.    i watched for a couple more minutes.   i was kind of spooked a little as i was in a dark field, woods all around and no one else out side with me.    

not sure what it was.  it was not a meteor.  it was not the flash from an iridium satellite, as it happened too fast.  i did not see anything but those two quick bright bursts of light.
content.summary: Two quick bursts of light in a black part of sky, not iridium satellite

content.detailedDescription: On camp hill, pennsylvania 10/19/2015 6:30pm 270 degrees west a clear sky a strange cloud was observe(no other cloud in the sky), several photos taken and one video, but only a few photos came out video do not play.(photos taken on samsung note 3) one of the photos had a strange object and the strange cloud. minutes later the cloud disappears and a light appears, by the time i lift the phone for a photo the light is gone. during and after several jets were observe in the sky. nothing else was observe.
content.summary: Strange cloud and small scout ufo

content.detailedDescription: My sister was in backyard painting spider bodies for school, she called out and had me come outside, called her daughter out also, all three of us watched the 2 bright orange orbs in sky.  they dimmed and then turned white and disappeared.  at first thought it was reflected sunlight on airship, but it dimmed and turned white and after a minute of white, disappeared from sight.  very noticeable, uncertain of duration but seemed about 6 to 10 minutes of our observation. do not know how long they were there before noticed.
content.summary: Bright orange lights 2 in sky near one another turned white and star like, about brightest of sky and near moon in dark sky

content.detailedDescription:
On 10/19/2015 @ 2:17pm 
i was watching cnbc news live.
news file (should companies disclose ceo's health)
upper right corner of the screen you will see @ first 4 clouds then a fifth
 will appear drop down slightly go left then shoots straight up

clouds = *                   0
moving object=0              0
                           ^ 0    *0
                           ^ 0     0         *
                           ^ 0000000
                            <  < < <  direction of flight
                                 *
                                 * 

    if it is recorded why not check it out
content.summary: Cloud like

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a flight from brisbane, australia going to vancouver, canada. i had a window seat and was flying alone but did have people seated next to me. i was looking out of my window and the sun was high, it must have been in the early afternoon sometime and there were little to no clouds. it was early into the flight, its hard for me to remember how far exactly into the flight we were but somewhere around a couple of hours. i saw out in the blue sky a line of demarcation, where it appeared the blue colour of the sky was a slightly different, yet still very distinguishably different, shade of blue. i followed the line with my eye and realized it was shaped like a triangle with rounded edges. it appeared to be about 200-300ft away from the plane but that is hard to say. the triangle area seemed to be huge, about the length of a football field or two and i want to say closer to two, but that is also hard to say. i sat there and watched it for about 20mins before it was out of my sight. i noticed the person sitting in front of me saw it but i never spoke to them and they never spoke up about what they saw. i just sat there quietly as well, i was a teenager at the time and was too afraid to speak up. i regret that now as well as waiting until now to tell mufon because now my memory of the event isn't what it once was. you never know what is important information and i have a deep belief in the possibility of other life in this universe, so i wish i spoke up sooner. i didn't own a camera or cell phone at the time either so no photos i'm afraid.
i thought it might have been something on my window making it look like something was outside but that wasn't it. we passed by it, it was stationary like it was just hoovering there. it looked very much like there was a solid triangle there but it was invisible other than that demarcation line from the 2 different shades of blue. you could just tell there was something there in the sky and it was big. i think about it a lot, whatever it was it affected me deeply. while in the plane and looking at the triangle in the sky i felt very weird. it was like everyone on the plane was in their own little world or bit out of it because it was dead quiet and totally inactive. i air felt still and i was slightly uncomfortable. this all could have been due to me just sort of freaking out a bit about what i was looking at but the energy in the plane felt weird like something was happening but nothing was. im probably not making any sense now sorry. moving on, i know what i saw and i believe strongly that it was real, that something solid was there. just thought i should let mufon know. hope it helps.

best regards,
alayna
content.summary: I was on a flight from brisbane, australia to vancouver, canada. i saw a large triangle shape out of my window.There were no clouds where i was looking just blue sky but there was a demarcation line in the blue sky and i realized it was a triangle.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were traveling east on i-20 and at around the bobby jones(i-520) exit saw what appeared to be sparkling lights to the left(north). we observed the object as we drove and around the washington road exit it appeared to become two objects, both with the same appearance of sparkling lights and changing shape. we pulled off the interstate at the river watch parkway exit for a closer observation and there were approx. 20 other vehicles also pulled over viewing these objects as they passed over i-20 moving towards the south east. we took one picture as the objects were farther off in the distance but both were still visible just above the treeline. unfortunately we did not get video ourselves but there have been a couple of nice videos posted to youtube of the same event at the same approx time and location which have images and descriptions which match what we saw very well.
content.summary: First observed object as sparkling lights that appeared to change shape.

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture during a visit to the hoover dam in feb of 2015.  i hadn't noticed the four objects flying in a straight line until after i got home.  i thought they might be helicopters, but i inquired with a friend who is a pilot, and he stated that they are not allowed to fly that close, so he has no idea what these are.
content.summary: I noticed these four objects over the hoover dam after getting home and reviewing the pics.  hoping you can tell what they are.  i thought they might be helicopters, but friend says they're not allowed to fly that close to each other, so this is unknown.

content.detailedDescription: I thought it was a star, this is the first time i've observed a ufo. the flight path wasn't like anything i've saw before. it remained in my vision for approximately an hour between 2 and 3:15 am. i can die happy knowing i've seen a ufo.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flashing with red/blue lights, star-like, very bright white light, strange travel path

content.detailedDescription: Approx. 10:20 am.  i was north bound on i45 shortly after leaving the centerville area and i noticed 2 low flying aircraft from the west traveling east.  cigar shaped, no wings or fins, shiney silver or chrome.  the second was slightly lower in the sky, but almost directly behind the other.  they were not as big as a 737.  then they were beyond the trees on the east side of the highway.
content.summary: Traveling west to east, crossed i45.

content.detailedDescription: I was in daytona beach florida, staying at the mayan inn for the labor day weekend holiday.  sunday morning 9/6/15, i went out onto the balcony and took 2 pictures of the sunrise on the last day of my trip.  i did not realize i had captured any thing on my camera.  i did not see anything as i sat on the balcony and looked at sunrise and ocean. so, the object was not visible to me.  the next day i was looking through my pictures and noticed on the one picture something different and when i enlarged my picture i was shocked to see object and the clarity of the object that appears to have 4 windows or lights.
content.summary: Sphere shaped object with lights or windows. a green like mist surrounds object.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on route 23 in butler. girlfriend pointed out an orange orb. looked at it and it wobbled slightly and had a haze like halo around it. nothing extremely remarkable, just odd. kept watching as it flew from route 23 in butler toward the area of wanaque reservoir. soon as it got to that area. it started to hover. then it started moving in one direction and making tight 180 degree turns back and forth. think of a orange orb on a formula one track. thats how tight the turns were yet it made those turns in different directions.  it made 3 of these sharp turns, hovered for a minute, then descended behind the tree line which i later found out is where the wanaque reservoir was by checking google earth. it was too high to be a drone and traveled from butler to wanaque which is several miles in the pitch black night. a quick glance at first and it could have been mistaken for a plane. as soon as it hoovered and made those 180 degree turns, the feeling was totally surreal. 3 people witnessed this including myself. it was so crazy that i believe someone else had to have seen it. this is a populated area. what the hell is going on at wanaque reservoir.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object flew over head, orange light with a haze. also wobbled! soon as it got to the direction on the wanaque resevior started making 180 degree turns and hovering

content.detailedDescription: We were leaving a function just before midnight on 10/17/2015, in springboro, ohio and in the western sky, just above the trees, were 6-8 bright lights hovering.  at first it looked like a couple helicopters just hovering, but then we noticed they were moving erratically, but in a cluster. they were moving, but still not gaining or losing altitude.  they then turned orange/red, then disappeared.  no smoke, they weren't chinese lanterns, as they didn't go up.  several others saw it, and there is a video on facebook, but nobody knows what it was?  i thought possibly parachute flares, but there was no smoke and no noise and they just disappeared.  i was with my brother and my 15 year old son and 16 year old daughter who also saw it.  it lasted about 5 minutes. probably a explanation of same, but nobody knows yet.
content.summary: We were in springboro, leaving a function just before midnight, and in the western sky, just above treeline were 4-6 bright white lights that changed to red/orange, hovering, but moving in different directions.

content.detailedDescription: Driving south east on a tertiary, familiar to us road approx 12-1 am, an object with several steady lights was above horizon, similar to how a plane looks going into logan airport at night as observed from castle island...But this was not moving. it was not a helicopter, and was approx 4-5 lights across by 2 - resembling a triangle, but a wide triangle. the lights looked like a cross, but the dark shape seemed trianguar. did not appear to be more than one object because lights were equal distance apart. the car was moving, and it seemed to be in one place, "facing" kind of north west. we didn't stop because it was late and the children were with grandparents, and it seemed too weird to us as we were sleepy. husband was driving, i followed it as we went and it remained in the same spot. we've seen coast guard/militry jets before, but never with this light display, and helicopters look longer at night - they are recognizable. i'm a private pilot and love to look at planes....This was weird.
content.summary: Several lights, not a helicopter, no lights as on other planes, approx 4-5 lights across, by 2. not moving, husband saw also. traveled road many times before, never seen anything like it

content.detailedDescription: Looked out front window saw a bright white light drop, then it moved up and moved to the right, behind the trees. fairly large. no noise.
content.summary: Looked out window saw a white light drop-then up and moved to my right.

content.detailedDescription:
1 the back yard of my home walking to the car in my car port to search for a pacifier.
2 hair stood up in the back of my neck and something in my mind told me to look up
3 a ufo
4 it hovered over the treetops roughly 50-100 feet shot left 50 feet or so hovered back right and began descent i left the object briefly to get my wife to witness it when we both came back it was behind the tree line at that point it was a bright blue (left) and bright red (right) level object that pulsated
5  during the sighting i immediately knew it was a ufo i was extremely excited and a bit scared. i used a lot of profanity and remember saying 'gd! this is it gd!' i attempted to take some video but for some i couldn't find it in the camera i switched my phone over to photo and and snapped a picture but still couldn't find it then my phone died unexpectedly. i then ran to get my wife brought her to the backyard and she witnessed it as well but from behind trees. roughly 1 hour later i heard a whiting sound and my wife and i could hear my oldest son who sleeps in the room next to us crying. i went to check on him and it appeared he had woken from a nightmare. i brought him to
the bed with me and my wife to calm
him and when i asked him if he had a nightmare he said 'no.' when i asked him what was wrong he said he was scared. when i asked him if he had a goosebumps television show dream he said 'no i was awake' so i asked him what are you scared of he said 'i don't want to go to the stars' and my wife asked me if that was something he saw in the goosebumps movie today and i said 'yes' but it wasn't i lied so i would not scare her. at that point i thought my
son may have been asked to go to the stars by something' after a minute passed i confessed to my wife that nothing like what my son was describing had happened in the movie and that i just said it did so i wouldn't 'freak her out' 

i asked my son why he was scared of going to the stars because he has a sticker mural of the solar system
in his room and he said 'because it was too high'


6at first i lost sight of the object because i ran to get my wife to witness it. she did witness it but at that point it was just a light behind the trees
content.summary: 2 lights 1 bright blue (left) 1 bright red (right) pulsing hovering left right up down no sound

content.detailedDescription:
My son was reviewing a video he took of a jet at an air show. he notices a flash he never seen before and slowed the video way down. a "thing" came out of the clouds and went under the jet and flew off way way faster than the jet itself. 

are you only interested in possible ufo's or do strange things like trees that uproot and move without drag marks or anything else disturbed in the area with no explanation, (i have pictures) and a possible shadow ghost on our surveillance. i will attach them below,

in the airshow video you need to run it very slow to see what we are talking about as it is so much faster than the jet. at approx.0.17 it appears from the top left and goes toward the bright cloud on the mid-right, the jet follows slowly as compared to the other craft. frame by frame is the best.

in the shadow ghost (file 1234) at about 0.17 also, it appears on the right and looks like a man walking to the left side. we have tried to re-create this with no luck at all. couldn't be car exhaust because no cars came in or out prior to the sighting and it looks like static starts messing with it.

the pictures show the tree, uprooted, moved about 3-4 feet with nothing disturbed around it. we have no explanation or ever saw it before or since.
content.summary: At an airshow

content.detailedDescription:
Gentlemen:   i am retired:

1. i was in bed, setting on edge of bed looking out window & observed these ufoes listed:

4. i did not loose sight of this object:
